rukus.text: 100|1|muccut tinara ativekamakac cellum kutiraikal mitu cattiyamaka
100|6|(ittakaiya kutiraikal mitu cattiyamaka!) Niccayamaka manitan tan iraivanukku nanrikettavan avan
100|9|avanaik kapriliruntu eluppappatum camayattil, avanutaiya ullattil ullavaiyellam ariyappattuvitum enpatai avan arintu kollavillaiya
100|10|avanaik kapriliruntu eluppappatum camayattil, avanutaiya ullattil ullavaiyellam ariyappattuvitum enpatai avan arintu kollavillaiya
100|11|niccayamaka manitarkalutaiya iraivan (tiyavan yar? Nallavan yar? Enru) avarkalai annalil nanku arintu kolvan
